item.title: Mamdani slammed for using kids in campaign videos after gloating about social media-free childhood
item.description: NYC mayoral hopeful Zohran Mamdani draws backlash from Instagram followers for using elementary school kids to promote his political campaign.

item.title: Trump backs ICE raid at Hyundai plant, but says US needs foreign experts to train Americans
item.description: President Trump reacted to the ICE raid that nabbed some 475 illegal migrants, mostly from South Korea, that were working at a Hyundai battery plant i...

item.title: Trump delivers ultimatum to Hamas: Accept deal and release hostages or pay the consequences
item.description: President Donald Trump told Hamas this is his last warning to accept hostage deal terms, with only 20 of 50 remaining hostages believed to still be al...

item.title: Ohio donors ditch Tim Ryan, pour nearly $220K into Vivek Ramaswamyâ€™s governor bid
item.description: Republican Vivek Ramaswamy's Ohio gubernatorial campaign has attracted nearly $220,000 from donors who previously supported Democrat Tim Ryan.

item.title: South Korea reaches deal with US to release workers detained after immigration raid
item.description: The U.S. will release some 300 South Korean migrants arrested at a Hyundai factory in Georgia after reaching a deal with South Korea's government.
